content: this two-tone crochet raglan sweater pattern is designed to be approachable for those new to crocheting garments it s super simple in design as well as in adjusting the sizing you can make this sweater in one color or if you want to make it two-toned you ll need 4 skeins in the top color and 2 in the bottom color if you make it smaller or larger you may need less or more skeins
